title: Are esa there in the month of apr-may-june?

comments.body: Go through the FAQs on this subreddit, answers to these basic questions have been documented there already.

ikr most of the questions the incoming batch is asking has already been answered. Whats even more annoying is some of them are checking if their 12th percentage sufficient for siting for a particular company 3 yrs down the line lol
A few companies do include Boards % as a parameter for shortlisting, however they are extremely few.
yeah I'm saying some of the freshers are calculating that now itself for those few companies for placement 3 yrs down the line
